Job Description: Job Description:    Are you looking for exciting career in Web or Mobile application Development in direction of emerging latest technologies ( RoR, ReactJs, AngularJs, VueJs, Hybrid or Native app development ) with serving International Clients (US, UK, Australia) and the pleasure of working and getting trained under enthusiastic team of best developers... If you're a person that is eager and fast to learn and you're comfortable in a dynamic startup environment, then you've just found the perfect chance !         Key Skills:      Excellent written and verbal communication skills.      Go-getter attitude and a strong work ethic.      Must have capacity to work independently and also as a part of team.      Keen to learn new technologies and implement those to solve business problems and improve application efficiency.      Excellent Problem-Solving skills and solution-oriented attitude.      Good understanding of Database Concepts, OS, HTMLCSS Concepts & Data Structure Concepts, C, C++, OOPS Concepts.
